data.app_name: Museum of Virtual and Augmented Reality
data.description:
Take a step into the history, present and future of virtual reality with our immersive experience for Oculus Quest 2. This virtual museum, meticulously designed in every corner, invites you to explore the exciting world of VR. Stroll between galleries and stands, while immersive videos tell you from the humble beginnings of this technology to its most recent advances.

Learn the subtle but fundamental differences between virtual reality, augmented reality and mixed reality. Each has its purpose and potential, and you will be surprised to discover how these technologies intertwine to offer experiences that we could only dream of before.

But it is not only a history lesson; It is also a window to the future. Learn about real use cases, from education and professional training to medicine, entertainment and more. Imagine performing complex surgeries with the help of VR or traveling to exotic destinations without leaving your home. Virtual reality is already here, transforming multiple sectors and offering a world full of possibilities.

If you are passionate about technology, a professional looking for new tools or simply curious about the digital world, this experience is for you. Let yourself be surprised and immerse yourself in the fascinating universe of virtual reality!
